newsitem.title: USA: Calpine acquires natural gas producer.
newsitem.headline: Calpine acquires natural gas producer.

text.p: Calpine Corp on Tuesday said it has acquired Montis Niger Inc, a natural gas production company, from Radnor Power for about $7.1 milllion

Montis Niger owns an estimated 10 billion cubic feet of proven natural gas reserves and an 80 mile pipeline system which ties into the company's Greenleaf 1 and 2 gas-fired power plants near Yuba City, Calif.
The acquisition will significantly lower Calpine's fuel costs for its Greenleaf facilities, Calpine said.
Radnor is a a wholly-owned subsidiary of LFC Financial Corp of Radnor, Pa.
